EmailTemplate.description: Alert to ensure onboardings are populating the necessary downstream data.
EmailTemplate.name: Onboarding Complete
EmailTemplate.subject: Onboarding Complete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
An onboarding has been completed. Please refer to the case below and ensure the following have occurred:
- An Asset has been created - The Asset's data aligns with that of the original Opportunity - The BT Product(s) associated with the Case have been attached to an Asset - A Bill has been created and both the BT Product(s) and the Asset(s) have been attached
Case: {!Case.Link}
